She also has a tendency to be a bit scatterbrained and disorganized, as evident in her initial hesitation to discuss her marriage and her tendency to ramble on about unrelated topics. However, Linda also shows a more vulnerable side, particularly when discussing her relationship with her new husband. She seems to be unsure about the long-term implications of their relationship and is struggling to come to terms with the idea of being in a non-traditional partnership.
